name: New XCommander
description:
2-4 player arcade shooter. Shoot down your opponents with 5 different weapons. Supports up to 4 players on keyboard or gamepad.

Based on the original game by Raymes Khoury. Previously a Chrome App.

Source code is hosted at github.com/kaydensigh/xcommander, and you can also play at kaydensigh.github.io/xcommander.
